Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.i18n

Interface LocalizerFactory.PostProcessCallback<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of the object instance (see LocalizerFactory.buildLocalizerForInstance(Object) for details)
Enclosing class:
LocalizerFactory
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface
public static interface LocalizerFactory.PostProcessCallback<T>

This lambda-styled interface describes callback for special processing of the data localized before assign the value to any target (for example, make automatic upper case for localization strings).

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String process​(Localizer localizer, T instance, java.lang.reflect.Field f, java.lang.String value)
    Process localized string content before assigning it to target

  • Method Details

    • process

      java.lang.String process​(Localizer localizer, T instance, java.lang.reflect.Field f, java.lang.String value)

      Process localized string content before assigning it to target

      Parameters:
      localizer - current localizer instance
      instance - current object instance
      f - current object field to assign value to
      value - value to be assigned
      Returns:
      modified value to be assigned. Return value parameter to skip processing
